structure.unit: COUNTY AND CITY BRIDGES, TUNNELS, AND FERRIES

law.catch_line: Bonds may be issued for construction or purchase of interstate bridges.
law.text: In addition to the powers granted in KRS 181.510 to 181.550, cities may purchase or construct and improve, operate, and maintain bridges over navigable streams so as to connect such cities with an adjoining state. In order to pay the cost of such acquisition or construction and improvements, the cities may issue bridge revenue bonds as provided in KRS 181.660.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 259, effective January 1, 2015. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3235g-7, 3235g-28.
